original_text: But all their words are lies. Their messages are their own ideas. When will they stop deceiving people? But all their words are lies. Their messages are their own ideas. When will they stop deceiving people?
korean_text: 거짓을 예언하는 선지자들이 언제까지 이 마음을 품겠느냐 그들은 그 마음의 간교한 것을 예언하느니라

sentences.original_text: But all their words are lies.
Their messages are their own ideas.
When will they stop deceiving people?
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 언제 사람들을 속이는 것을 멈추겠는가?

sentences.original_text: But all their words are lies.
